response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors. The product, valued at $1,000,000 by you, holds an even greater significance to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and potential impact. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional chance to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 48 hours.", "product_price": 950000}
